data.name: IntroLead
data.value: Farewell My Beloved is a small personal project I created while learning ASP.NET.

data.name: P2
data.value: The idea comes from my love for Hololive and the community around it. Over time, I've seen members graduate and leave, but I've also seen how fans come together to say goodbye with love, gratitude, and respect.

data.name: P3
data.value: This app is a space where anyone can do the sameâ€”whether it's for their oshi, a favorite creator, or anyone they want to honor with a farewell.

data.name: P4
data.value: Hi, I'm a Software Engineering graduate with a passion for clean design, thoughtful systems, and building useful tools.

data.name: P5
data.value: After a few years working in IT and exploring software development projects, I found myself fascinated by how smart processes can shape real outcomes. This platform is a side project born from that curiosity, combined with my love for minimalism, user-centered design, and a bit of gamification theory I picked up back in university.

data.name: P6
data.value: I believe great technology should be simple, fair, and even a little bit fun. Thanks for being here. I hope you find it meaningful and refreshing!

data.name: Footer
data.value: Made with love for the community
